history.content: The Center for Energy Efficient Electronics Science is looking to hire a work-study student to work 10-15 hours a week (40 hours/week in Summer 2020). This position will be primarily supporting the E3S Associate Director of Education and the Transfer-to-Excellence REU program. All applicants will be considered; Junior transfer students, STEM students, and past TTE participants are strongly encouraged to apply. Position carries potential for full-time summer 2020 employment. Work-study job #8622272984; Email Resume to Nicole McIntyre at nicolemcintyre@berkeley.edu
history.subject: E³S is Hiring a Student Assistant!
